title: HyperInvite奖励怎么设置？
txt_content:
本帖最后由 242121899 于 2020-3-19 10:43 编辑 

插件链接
https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=819184&extra=page%3D1%26filter%3Dsortid%26sortid%3D7%26searchoption%255B61%255D%255Bvalue%255D%3DHyperInvite%26searchoption%255B61%255D%255Btype%255D%3D&page=1
我这样写的然后就不能用了
[size=12.0000pt]mysql: 
[size=12.0000pt]  enable: false
[size=12.0000pt]  url: 'localhost:3306'
[size=12.0000pt]  user: 'root'
[size=12.0000pt]  password: ''
[size=12.0000pt]  database: 'invite'
[size=12.0000pt]  table: 'playerdata'
[size=12.0000pt]set: 
[size=12.0000pt]  min_online: 30 
[size=12.0000pt]  min_level: 30
[size=12.0000pt]  max_level: 50
[size=12.0000pt]  invite_level: 20
[size=12.0000pt] 
[size=12.0000pt]bind_reward: 
[size=12.0000pt]- "bc &e%player%绑定了一条邀请码"
[size=12.0000pt]- "money give %player% 5000"
[size=12.0000pt]- "points give %player% 10"
[size=12.0000pt]invite_reward: 
[size=12.0000pt]- "bc &c%player%领取了邀请奖励"
[size=12.0000pt]- "money give %player% 20000"
[size=12.0000pt]- "points give %player% 50"
[size=12.0000pt]extra_reward:
[size=12.0000pt]- "5|bc 6&%player%已确认邀请达到5人"
[size=12.0000pt]- "money give %player% 90000"
[size=12.0000pt]- "points give %player% 300"
